effect.Name: Addition With Hyperbolic Tangent
effect.description: Addition With Hyperbolic Tangent - Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic tangent
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Addition With Hyperbolic Tangent (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic tangent

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
